game_description: Welcome to Fire Extinguisher VR, an immersive fire extinguisher training experience. Users are shown a training presentation that includes classes of fires, types of fire extinguishers and the correct usage. After an interactive quiz to assess their knowledge, users are immersed in a simulation where they need to put their expertise to the test and extinguish a fire under pressure. We’ve developed Fire Extinguisher VR to simulate the exact steps you would need to take in real life to use a fire extinguisher safely. Featuring sounds, timed responses and following the same process you’d need to take in real-life, Fire XR is more cost-effective and realistic than the majority of fire extinguisher training on offer. Please get in touch with us on our website for large-scale commercial use. Our commercial version includes digital certification, additional scenarios and training reminders.
review_1: App really helps teach the basics of Fire Safety! Demo currently only includes grease fires, but hopefully more will be included in the full version
review_2: Really nice graphics and good mechanics. Needs a bit of refinement, but great start guys!
